tutorial_quest_01/0601_0701_0100_10:
Hey! Brock and Misty were telling me
about you. It looks like you’re getting
the hang of Pokémon battles!
tutorial_quest_01/0601_0701_0200_10:
I’ll teach you more advanced techniques.
You’d better not blow me off!
tutorial_quest_01/0602_0702_0100_10:
Hey, not too shabby! But then again, I’m the one
teaching you, so it’s only natural!
tutorial_quest_01/0602_0702_0200_10:
Maybe you can become as good as me someday!
Don’t let that get to your head. You gotta keep
training for that to happen!
